GlossaryTerm.TermName: central nervous system primitive neuroectodermal tumor

TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of cancer that arises from a particular type of cell within the brain or spinal cord. Also called CNS PNET.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "central nervous system primitive neuroectodermal tumor"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "tumor neuroectodérmico primitivo del sistema nervioso central"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: tumor neuroectodérmico primitivo del sistema nervioso central

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: SNC TNEP. Tipo de cáncer que surge de un tipo particular de célula dentro del cerebro o la médula espinal. También se llama TNEP del SNC.
